background positioning percentages.back:
p {background-image: url(teddy.png); background-repeat: no-repeat;}
p.c1 { background-position: 0% 0%;} /* top left */
p.c2 { background-position: 50% 50%;} /* center center */
p.c3 { background-position: 100% 100%;} /* bottom left */
p.c4 { background-position: 0% 100%;} /* bottom left */
p.c5 { background-position: 100% 0%;} /* top right */

background.back:
body {background: white url(teddy.png) top left repeat-y fixed;}
/* background-color background-image background-position background-repeat background-attachment */
